meanings.definition: Relating to the chemical composition of the cosmos.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted a cosmochemical analysis of the meteorite.
meanings.sent2: Researchers use advanced tools to study the cosmochemical properties of distant stars.
meanings.sent3: The aliens found our cosmochemical experiments quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a cosmochemical masterpiece, blending colors like galaxies in space.
meanings.sent5: The cosmochemical nature of the universe fascinated the young astronomer.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the study of the chemical makeup of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: Astronomers rely on cosmochemical data to understand the origins of planets.
meanings.sent2: The cosmochemical research expedition aimed to collect samples from asteroids.
meanings.sent3: The cosmochemical conference was filled with starry-eyed scientists.
meanings.sent4: The telescope revealed a cosmochemical ballet of planets in motion.
meanings.sent5: The cosmochemical mysteries of the moon captivated the young astronomer.
